article:
Different people have different hobbies. We students also have our own hobbies, such as reading, painting, growing vegetables in our gardens and looking after animals. _ can make us grow, develop   our interests and help us learn new _ .
Liu Tao is a student. His hobby is _ . When he was in senior high school, he wrote a book and published   it in 2007. Many teenagers   _ his book. As a result, he becomes a successful young _ now.
Liu Tao is very lucky _ his hobby brings him pleasure and success. But he regards writing _ only one of his many hobbies and interests. He is _ in many other things. He likes playing football, too. Now he is a member of his school team.
Remember that we _ spend all our time on our favourite hobby. There are many other interesting things to do in life, and we should try to do something new or different.
